component.name: AlignPeaks
component.doc: Aligns peaks to multiple organisms. For this Mikhail's alignment pipeline is used. T-coffee is used for alignment.

output.name: AlignedPeaks
output.doc: File containing all 500 or so multialigned peaks.

output.name: Sequences
output.doc: File containing all 500 or so extracted reference sequences.

output.name: intermediate
output.doc: Directory for all the intermediate output, like the config file

parameter.name: AlignPipePath
parameter.doc: Path to Mikhail's alignment pipeline script /import/bc2/home/nimwegen/GROUP/Pipeline2/Scripts/pipeline_dev.pl or so.
